Parameter.name: VOID
Parameter.Description: C void type. May be used only for the type of return value.

Parameter.name: UINT64
Parameter.Description:
Unsigned 64-bit int (Usually equal to C type unsigned long long int).

Works wrong with values larger than maximum of signed 64-bit integers because of Cache %Integer class limitations.

Parameter.name: INT64
Parameter.Description: Signed 64-bit int (Usually equals to C type long long int).

Parameter.name: FLOAT
Parameter.Description:
Single precision floating point type.

Value of this types must be passed to functions as %Double.

Parameter.name: DOUBLE
Parameter.Description:
Double precision floating point type.

Value of this types must be passed to functions as %Double.

Parameter.name: LONGDOUBLE
Parameter.Description: Type equal to C long double. It's supported not for all platforms.

Parameter.name: SIZET
Parameter.Description: Type equal to C size_t. Usually it is an unsigned 32 or 64-bit integer.

Parameter.name: NTYPES
Parameter.Description: Number of all available types in CNA.

Method.name: ThrowMessage
Method.Implementation: set st = $$$ERROR($$$GeneralError, msg) throw ##class(%Exception.StatusException).CreateFromStatus(st)

Method.name: CreateStructType
ConvertTypeFromCacheToCNA
GetAlignments
ApplyAlignment
GetSizeAndAlignment
CheckStructSupport
ConvertStructFromCacheToCNA
ConvertStructFromCNAToCache
SignedToUnsigned
UnsignedToSigned
ConvertIntegerFromCacheToCNA
ConvertIntegerFromCNAToCache
ConvertFromCacheToCNA
ConvertFromCNAToCache
CallFunction
Method.Description:
Calls function name from previously loaded dynamic library.

You need to specify types of this function return value and types of all arguments. Types may be represented as one of CNA.CNA parameters if it is a plain C datatype or as %ListOfDataTypes of parameters if it is a structure. You need to put all argument types in one collection %ListOfDataTypes and pass it to argument argTypes. If there is no arguments you need to pass an empty collection.

Argument values is passed the same way as a simple function arguments after first four of it.

See examples in CNA.Tests.

Method.name: LoadLibrary
Method.Description: Loads dynamic library with path <var>path</var> to CNA.

Method.name: FreeLibrary
Method.Description: Releases loaded dynamic library from CNA.

Method.name: %OnNew
%OnClose
PointerGetAt
Method.Description:
Provides access to array element with index index.

pointer must be a C array created by ConvertStreamToPointer, ConvertStringToPointer or by C functions.

type is passed with the same rules as in CallFunction.

Operating with pointers may be unsafe!

Method.name: PointerSetAt
Method.Description:
Assigns value to array element with index index.

pointer must be a C array created by ConvertStreamToPointer, ConvertStringToPointer or by C functions.

type is passed with the same rules as in CallFunction.

Operating with pointers may be unsafe!

Method.name: ConvertStringToPointer
Method.Description: Converts Cache string to C array and returns a <var>pointer</var> to the beginning of this array.

Method.name: ConvertStreamToPointer
Method.Description: Converts Cache stream to C array and returns a <var>pointer</var> to the beginning of this array.
